dict.acceptation: 等候；等待；（尤指长期地）希望；盼望；
准备妥；在手边；可得到；可使用；

sent.orig: The protocol presented is compared with concurrency control HP2PL and OCC-TI-WAIT-50 protocol by simulation experiments.
sent.trans: 通过模拟仿真与传统的HP2PL和OCC-TI-WAIT-50协议进行比较。

sent.orig: Wait, wait, wait. I was at home the whole time. How did I miss that?
sent.trans: 等等，我一直都在家，为什么没看到？

sent.orig: I said, wait, wait, do I have to walk all the way over there?
sent.trans: 我说，我说，等等等，我是不是还得一路走到那里去？

sent.orig: Wait on, Beano, wait till you can get a free one.
sent.trans: 等一下，比诺，等你能领到一个免费的再走。

sent.orig: The average amount of wait time (milliseconds) for each lock request that resulted in a wait.
sent.trans: 导致等待的每个锁请求的平均等待时间量（毫秒）。
